---
title: Labels and titles
jupyter: python3
---


```{python}
from plotnine import *
from plotnine.data import penguins

p = (
    ggplot(penguins, aes("flipper_length_mm", "body_mass_g", color="species"))
    + geom_point()
)

```


## Labelling title and axes

```{python}
p + labs(
    title="Penguin flipper length vs body mass",
    x="Flipper length (mm)",
    y="Body mass (g)",
)
```

## Labeling scale guides (e.g. color)



```{python}
p + labs(color="COLOR")
```

```{python}
p + scale_color_discrete(name="COLOR")
```

## Removing scale guides


```{python}
# TODO: how to make disappear in labs?
p + guides(color="none")
```


## Scales for labelling and removing


```{python}
# | eval: false
# Thorough: scales
(p + scale_color_discrete(guide=None) + scale_x_continuous(name="Flipper Length (mm)"))

# Quick: labs and guides
p + labs(x="Flipper Length (mm)") + guides(color="none")
```

```{python}
# | echo: false
p + labs(x="Flipper Length (mm)") + guides(color="none")
```



## Styling labels with theme()

```{python}
(
    ggplot(penguins, aes("flipper_length_mm", "body_mass_g"))
    + geom_point()
    + theme(
        axis_text_x=element_text(color="orange"),
        axis_title_x=element_text(color="blue", size=16),
    )
)
```
